CreatePost.name: CreatePost
CreatePost.label: Create a Post (delete)

spec.help: The starting index of the formatting range (inclusive).
spec.name: start
spec.label: Start

spec.help: The ending index of the formatting range (exclusive).
spec.name: end
spec.label: End

nested.help: The color to use, in standard hex format, with leading #.
nested.name: hex
nested.label: HEX

spec.help: For display purposes, this indicates whether the dimensions are defaults.
spec.name: original_dimensions_missing
spec.label: Original dimensions missing

spec.help: This indicates whether this media object is a cropped version of the original media.
spec.name: cropped
spec.label: Is cropped

spec.help: This indicates whether this media object has the same dimensions as the original media.
spec.name: has_original_dimensions
spec.label: Hes original dimensions

expect.help: A source attribution for the post content.
expect.name: source_url
expect.label: Source URL

expect.help: Whether or not to share this via any connected Twitter account on post publish. Defaults to the blog's global setting.
expect.name: send_to_twitter
expect.label: Send to Twitter

expect.help: Whether or not to share this via any connected Facebook account on post publish. Defaults to the blog's global setting.
expect.name: send_to_facebook
expect.label: Send to Facebook

expect.help: Whether this should be a private answer, if this is an answer.
expect.name: is_private
expect.label: Is private

nested.help: The unique public identifier of the Tumblelog that's being reblogged from.
nested.name: parent_tumblelog_uuid
nested.label: Parent tumblelog UUID

nested.help: The unique public post ID being reblogged.
nested.name: parent_post_id
nested.label: Parent Post ID

nested.help: The unique per-post hash validating that this is a genuine reblog action.
nested.name: reblog_key
nested.label: Reblog key

nested.help: Whether or not to hide the reblog trail with this new post.
nested.name: hide_trail
nested.label: Hide trail

CreatePost.description: Creates a post in Neue Post Format (NPF).

UpdatePost.name: UpdatePost
UpdatePost.label: Update a Post

expect.help: To update a post, the type must match with the original type of the post.
expect.name: type

nested.help: The full post body, HTML allowed.
nested.name: body
nested.label: Body

nested.help: The full text of the quote.
nested.name: quote
nested.label: Quote

nested.help: Cited source, HTML allowed.
nested.name: source
nested.label: Source

nested.help: The text of the conversation/chat, with dialogue labels (no HTML).
nested.name: conversation
nested.label: Conversation

nested.help: The text of the conversation/chat, with dialogue labels (no HTML).
nested.name: url
nested.label: URL

nested.help: A user-supplied description, HTML allowed.
nested.name: description
nested.label: Description

nested.help: The url of an image to use as a thumbnail for the post.
nested.name: thumbnail
nested.label: Thumbnail

nested.help: An excerpt from the page the link points to, HTML entities should be escaped.
nested.name: excerpt
nested.label: Excerpt

nested.help: The name of the author from the page the link points to, HTML entities should be escaped.
nested.name: author
nested.label: Author

nested.help: The click-through URL for the photo.
nested.name: url
nested.label: Link

nested.help: The URL of the site that hosts the audio file (not tumblr).
nested.name: external_url
nested.label: External URL

nested.help: HTML embed code for the video or a URI to the video. If you provide an unsupported service's URI you may receive a 400 response.
nested.name: embed
nested.label: Embed

expect.help: Whether or not to share this via any connected Twitter account on post publish. Defaults to the blog's global setting.
expect.name: tweet
expect.label: Send to Tweet

expect.help: The exact date and time (ISO 8601 format) to publish the post, if desired. This parameter will be ignored unless the state parameter is "queue".
expect.name: date
expect.label: Publish On

expect.help: Add a short text summary to the end of the post URL.
expect.name: slag
expect.label: Slag

expect.help: Convert any external image URLs to Tumblr image URLs.
expect.name: native_inline_images
expect.label: Native inline images
